name: The pit (itch) (Ernesto Torres)
description:
A small horror FPS made for ludumdare #48

Survive The Pit fighting your way through waves of spiders while you keep descending.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Left click - Shoot

spacebar - Jump

B - Turn off/on light

F - Toggle fullscreen

Esc - quit

Credits

A game by Ernesto Torres

Original Music Loop by BaDoink https://freesound.org/people/BaDoink/sounds/522035/

Edited for the game by Ernesto Torres
